To test this download some wallpaper with full dark background with some subject in the middle now turn off the lights and see it in the dark room, the area which has drak part - pixels won't light up only the subject in other color will be visible. It's saves battery and gives rich display experience.
Fingerprint sensor - it's so quick, it learns and adapts to your fingers when everytime you use them so it can be accurate.

Cons
